item.title: Multifactorial experiment simulator
item.description:
Instructions

This tool allows user to simulate multifactorial experiments. The optimization result can be verified here: This tool provides an error of the estimated values for the factors.

 Select number of factors
 Select the upper and lower limits
Factor
Lower limit
Upper limit
 Perform individual experiment/measure distance from optimum value (validate optimum value)
Factor
Value
 Perform bulk experiments

item.title: One day workshop on LaTeX
item.description:
This workshop presents an introduction to the programming language LaTeX for the first time users.

Slides

Other files

Requirements

A PC with the following software installed. Or having a good Internet connection to work with ShareLaTeX

  1. Latest version of TeXLive.
  2. A LaTeX IDE (Ex. TeXstudio)

Venue

Facultad de Contadura y Administracin, Blvd. Revolucin 151 Ote., Torren, CP 2700

Time

9AM to 2PM on 16th June 2016
